name: ESP32-S3-LCD-EV-BOARD
long_description: ESP32-S3-LCD-EV-BOARD is a development board for evaluating and verifying ESP32-S3 screen interactive applications. It has the functions of touch screen interaction and voice interaction.

placeholders.__ESP_BOARD_I2C_INIT__:
/* Initialize I2C (for touch and audio) */
    bsp_i2c_init();
